explains: v. 照射，照亮；阐明，解释；使容光焕发；用彩灯装饰；用金、银等彩色图案装饰（书稿的书页或首词第一个字母）

sentences.en: Instead of formulas and charts, the two instructors use games and drawings to illuminate their subject.
sentences.cn: 这两位教师用游戏和图画而不是公式和图表来阐明他们的题旨。

sentences.en: Thanks to fibre optics, it is now possible to illuminate many of the body's remotest organs and darkest orifices.
sentences.cn: 多亏有了光纤，如今才能够照见人体中许多最微小的器官和最暗的腔体。

sentences.en: Second, data can illuminate patterns of behavior we haven't yet noticed.
sentences.cn: 其次，数据可以阐明一些我们尚未注意到的行为模式。
